phrs.translation: 也称组织微阵列, 组织芯片, 组织微阵列, 即组织微阵列
微阵列, 基因微晶片法, 基因芯片技术, DNA微阵列制备与应用
蛋白微阵列, 蛋白质微阵列
寡核苷酸芯片, 寡核苷酸微阵列

sentences.sentence: Drugs giants such as Roche and Merck are also routinely using microarrays in their drug-discovery processes.
sentences.translation: 像罗氏，默克之类的制药巨擎，为数组技术还应用于药物开发过程。

sentences.sentence: Small molecule microarrays are being used in ultra high throughput screening of large combinatorial libraries (see microfluidics ).
sentences.translation: 小分子微辐射被用于大的组合文库的超高度大规模筛选。

sentences.sentence: In 1999 the journal Nature Genetics dedicated a special issue to DNA microarrays with an introductory essay entitled "array of hope".
sentences.translation: 1999年《科学》杂志为DNA微数组技术制作了特辑，并以“带来希望的数组”为标题作了引言。
